p: In top models for survival, where the effect was in the predicted direction, hypotheses explained 11–44% of the variation in survival for amphibians in the maritime zone; 10–69% of the variation in survival in the Mediterranean zone; and 10–55% of the variation in survival in the Montane zone ( S5). In top recruitment models where the effect was in the predicted direction, the amount of variation explained was 19–41% maritime; 50–53% Mediterranean; and 6–46% montane ( S5).
